question: You have recently moved to a different city. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter: Explain why you decided to move to a different city Describe the new city and accommodation Ask your friend to arrange a visit
text: Greeting, Hope you are doing well. I am sorry I was not been able to be in touch with you for the last couple of months. Honestly speaking, I hardly had time for myself too in the last few months.

By the way, I am super happy to share that I have recently moved to Ahmedabad. If you remember, I mentioned when we met last,that  I am expecting a promotion. My company has promoted me as Project manager and given me the responsibilities of our Ahmedabad office.

Ahmedabad is situated on the bank of river Tapi. There are many popular destinations such as Sidi Saiyyed Mosque, Sabarmati Ashram, and Adalaj Stepwell to name a few. Besides, I have rented a house in the heart of the old city. Actually, my office is located near the old city. Hence, it gives me an ease to go to the famous food street. The place is quite happening during night time.I would strongly recommend you to spend a weekend whenever possible.
Give my regards to everyone in the house ,especially to your sister Areeza. I am super excited to see you after a long time.
